sequence:
Red Spider Lily's Love

<size=45>Chapter 4 - Allies and Days of Old</size>

scripts.say: One day - At an Iron Blood-Sakura Empire party
Ah, you must be...
Graf Zeppelin. How unexpected to find you of all at a gathering of this kind.
I came on a whim. Besides, someone has to look after the kids. That's why you're here, no?
... That, I can't deny. Perhaps it's because my design was based on yours... We are similar not just in strength, but in these matters as well.
You simply must fight alongside me next time. Having another Akagi around is reassuring.
... By the way, I was rather taken aback when I heard you joined us instead of that "God."
True. Had I not met the Commander, I would likely have stayed with "God."
It was back in Midway... You and the Commander reenacted that legendary battle there.
Continuing the war, hurting your allies, and searching for beings with the potential to Awaken, all just to get your hands on that abhorrent power...
That "me" who followed "God"... whether she's real or not is just a possibility.
A "possibility"...?
We are 2 sides of the same coin... Born of the same stuff, my own existence is also a "possibility."
The moment I met you in battle, that too was a "possibility" of sorts. As is my sitting here enjoying a nice cold beer with you...
All because of the "possibility" that I met the Commander who freed me from the "Sirens."
... Hm... And does the Commander know that?
The day will come when he understands.
Our existence, "Sanctuary," "Soul," and the "Original..."
Right... now I'm afraid you've lost me.
Hehe... seems I've gone and gotten myself a bit tipsy...
Let's take this conversation someplace a bit quieter.
Regardless, I'm sure the Commander will love me... *Giggle*
